title: David Gower

coverImg.altText: at Sydney Cricket Ground, Australia, c.2007.

summary: David Ivon Gower OBE (born 1 April 1957) is a British cricket commentator and former cricketer who was captain of the England cricket team during the 1980s. Described as one of the most stylish left-handed batsmen of his era, Gower played 117 Test matches and 114 One Day Internationals (ODI)
